New Records: Kiké Hernández tied Babe Ruth with 15 postseason home runs
Max Muncy tied Corey Seager and Justin Turner for the most postseason home runs in Dodgers history (13 each)
Key Match Events: Kiké Hernández hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning to extend the lead to four runs
Max Muncy hit a solo home run in the ninth inning to tie the Dodgers' postseason home run record
Post-Match Reflections: Mookie Betts and Max Muncy praised Kiké Hernández's performance and focus in critical moments
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fly balls hit to left field were knocked down by the wind affecting play
Reed Garrett's splitter pitch led to Hernández's home run
Others: Hernández's 15 postseason home runs tie Babe Ruth's record
Updated standings showed Hernández climbing the active playoff home run leaderboard
